title: Professional Scrum Master (PSM I) certification&#58; why I chose PSM, and how did I prepare for it?
tags: scrum, project management, psm, agile, csm, certification, master, scrum master, exam
snippet: Hello there,I am very excited to share my first blog post with you.For everyone who doesn’t know, I’ve graduated from the University of Sydney with Master’s in Project Management, and I’ve worked in the software development industry as Project/Product Manager for 5+ years. I hold PSM I and PSPO I...
